channel.title: BI on Alok's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in BI on Alok's Blog

item.title: Inventory Replenishment
item.description: Talk about business opportunity History and Comparison Consumer and Customer Analytics Replenishment: Replenishment Execution System: Order Point Order Upton Point Defining these two points is the key. Unknowns and Parameters –> Optimizations Terms Lead time – Time between ordering and getting items avail for sale. Order to pickup + Pickup to location + Warehouse to location ROQ – Recommended Order Quantity Inventory selling days – No of days of supply desired when replenishment is made.

item.title: RA AND BI
item.description: RA and BI tips: Compression table use FROM_DT_WID and TO_DT_WID columns to indicate the time range in which records are valid. Current Table stores latest positional fact data at the base level. Defined in day dimension levels Flow: Taken to the staging table or fact table first. Temp table from facts table with surrogate keys for ease of processing If data in temp table is new, inserted into the target table as well.
